long_description: This Pro-Tec Athletics Iliotibial Band wrap provides targeted compression to stabilize the iliotibial tract. Wrap absorbs stress to the area and reduces friction and rubbing of the femoral condyle. Included compression pad provides effective, targeted compression. Provides warmth and reduces stress to the iliotibial band (IT band). Pad is made from 2 in. wide UBL neoprene for comfort next to skin. Pro-Tec Athletics Iliotibial Band wrap is adjustable and stays in place.
short_description: This Pro-Tec Athletics Iliotibial Band wrap provides targeted compression to stabilize the iliotibial tract.
